member.name: T:SimpleML.Containers.Persistence.IFile
member.summary: Provides an abstraction of the System.IO.File class, to facilitate mocking and unit testing.

member.name: M:SimpleML.Containers.Persistence.IFile.ReadAllLines(System.String)
member.summary: Opens a text file, reads all lines of the file, and then closes the file.
member.param: The file to open for reading.
member.returns: A string array containing all lines of the file.
